steps.plaintext: Head to the Grove of Dreams to find Arakunti
steps.markdown: Head to the ◀Grove of Dreams▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Grove_of_Dreams▷ to find ◀Arakunti▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Arakunti▷

substeps.plaintext: You can find the entry to the Grove of Dreams by going north from the marker of the quest on the map, following a large tree root to a stone littered opening on the ground. Jump down the opening.
